subject: Re: Setup
msgSnippet: We did it like this: We implemented a MyTestCase class where all test cases inherit from. Some pseudo code below: void MyTestCase.setUp() {
messageBody:
We did it like this:

We implemented a MyTestCase class where all test cases inherit from.
Some pseudo code below:

void MyTestCase.setUp() {
OneTimeSetupSingleton().instance().initialize();
super.setUp();
}

public void OneTimeSetupSingleton.instance() {
// cvInstance is a static class member
// of type OneTimeSetupSingleton
if (cvInstance==null) {
cvInstance=new OneTimeSetupSingleton();
}
return cvInstance;
}

public void OneTimeSetupSingleton.initialize() {
// isInitialized is a boolean instance member
if (this.isInitialized==false) {
// one time init code
this.isInitialized=true;
}
}


Hope this helps,
Chris Lewold
EMail: lewold@...
